channel.title: What I need to Know
channel.description:
Hello, I am making a Runescape Private server. I ahvent coded for about 4months+ now well anything serious or at all. but, I wouldliek to know how to specfaclly do this stuff. thank you all for your help.
1. how to change the maximum level of a skill to 99. They are currently set to 100.
2. How to change the maximum experience of a skill to 13b for 99 instead of 1b.
3. how to find my coords.
4. the code to spawn npc's and make them move.
5. The ags code ::pickup 0035 1 Is currently excalibur. how can i change and make ags?
6. how to change the max gold from 999m to 2b
7. how to add shops.
8. how to change the damage dealth by an npc. currently goblins hit 30's+
9. how to change max damage of a weapon
10. how to change weapon speed.
11. how to add a npc at home that says "welcome to RuneReality"
12. how to add teleports in mage book
13. how to add emotes
14. how to add a ::adminset command which gives admin gear
15. how to make an item bound non tradeable
16. how to change the value of an item at shops
17. how to add items into shops
18. how would i make it so i get beter quaility for images such as my walls look liek the walls from runescape year 2005 or 2006
19. how do I make it so when i click to turn off melle protect or other prays like that I don't have to re-log
20. how to delete a piece of fence
21. how to add a fishing spot
22. how to get rid of spells in te spell book
23. how to make a custom quest.
24. *higher then my current ability* how do i add a new minigame / skill
25. how do I make it so I dont have to type ::pickup 0035 1 and make it so i can just type ::pickup 35 1
26. how do i get out of pnpc mode withuot logging
27. how to make it so you can thieve from a man but also make it so the man att's you if he see's you?

item.title: What I need to Know
item.dc:creator: @arve arve
item.description:
@arve wrote:

all this is common sense…

if you dont now anything of this, then you should not be making a server…

Read full topic

item.title: What I need to Know
item.dc:creator: @ngjunda ngjunda
item.description:
@ngjunda wrote:

Whooaa, seems that you have still got many doubts regarding RSPS coding just like many of us here. Well I would not be of much help here, but I think that it’s really pointless in posting such a long list here when most of the people would be trying to flame your post. I suggest you to base your project on a “pre-build” base like delta and learn some simple coding and code and change ur server here and there and you’ll have ur own server. good Luck=)

Read full topic

item.title: What I need to Know
item.dc:creator: @recker450 recker450
item.description:
@recker450 wrote:

Do what half this community does, leech a delta

or rip stuff off from it
i ripped its npc drop system and placed it into an czar

Read full topic

item.title: What I need to Know
item.dc:creator: @aces610 aces610
item.description:
@aces610 wrote:

I know i posted in wrong section i also placed in help. I am trying to base this server on all tuts

Read full topic

item.description:
@Project_MultiBarrage wrote:

Ok, If you need to know all thisnyou shouldn’t make a server LOL

item.description:
@itai wrote:

What I need to know is how you don’t have the common sense to post in the correct section.

Read full topic

@aces610 wrote:

Hello, I am making a Runescape Private server. I ahvent coded for about 4months+ now well anything serious or at all. but, I wouldliek to know how to specfaclly do this stuff. thank you all for your help.

  1. how to change the maximum level of a skill to 99. They are currently set to 100.

  5. The ags code ::pickup 0035 1 Is currently excalibur. how can i change and make ags?
